t: Amazon Brand Registry | Sell on Amazon

t: Ein Problem mit einem Artikel nach Ablauf des Rückgabezeitraums lösen - Amazon-Kundenservice
s: Wenn du nach Ablauf des Rückgabezeitraums von 14 oder 30 Tagen nach Erhalt deines Artikels ein Problem damit hast, sieh unter Meine Bestellungen nach, ob es verfügbare Lösungen gibt. Weitere Informationen zum geltenden Rückgabezeitraum findest du in unseren Rückgabebedingungen.

t: Amazon
s: My main reason for pursuing reinstatement is that my account has been suspended so unfairly - and I have been penalized so heavily for such a minor issue. I was a very careful seller. I sold mostly branded products that I purchased directly from the brands in question.

t: Sales collapse forces 'woke' mega-brand to make humiliating U-turn and relist on Amazon | Daily Mail Online
s: 1 day ago - America's most popular shoe is coming back to Amazon. After a five-year hiatus, Nike shoes, clothing, and accessories are returning to the e-commerce giant. The athletic brand swiped its products from the platform in 2019, as part of a push to sell more directly to consumers.

t: Amazon (company) - Wikipedia
s: 3 days ago - Amazon.com, Inc., doing business as Amazon (/ˈæməzɒn/ ⓘ, AM-ə-zon; UK also /ˈæməzən/, AM-ə-zən), is an American multinational technology company engaged in e-commerce, cloud computing, online advertising, digital streaming, and artificial intelligence.

t: Nike to resume selling directly on Amazon for first time since 2019
s: 1 week ago - Nike confirmed to CNBC that its shoes are returning to Amazon.

t: Amazon is dropping dozens of in-house brands you didn’t even know it owned | The Verge
s: August 10, 2023 - The retail giant plans on cutting ... private-label brands across a variety of departments, most of which operate without Amazon branding, such as Solimo, Wag, and Mama Bear....

t: How Did I Lose the Amazon Buy Box? - Blue Wheel
s: December 13, 2024 - Discover how to win and keep the Amazon Buy Box. Maximize your sales & advertising potential on Amazon. Contact Blue Wheel for expert support and guidance.

t: The Life and Death of the Amazon Brands
s: August 15, 2023 - They sold well, and Amazon spent the next decade quietly expanding its house brands under dozens of inconspicuous names — Goodthreads, Solimo, Pinzon, Lark & Ro, Mama Bear, and Presto, to name a few — targeting thousands of high-demand categories with mostly budget-conscious items.

t: Brand Stores: Kostenlos eine Markenseite auf Amazon erstellen | Amazon Ads
s: Brand Stores helfen Ihnen dabei, die Markenbekanntheit zu steigern, indem Sie Ihre Marke und Ihren Produktkatalog unter Ihrer eigenen Amazon-Webadresse präsentieren. Sie können einen Brand Store ohne zusätzliche Kosten erstellen – ohne dass eine Programmierung notwendig ist.

t: Amazon veröffentlicht den Brand Protection Report 2023
